author: Christopher Carbone
title: Antibody points to potential weak spot on novel coronavirus
description: Scientists are working hard to understand how antibodies could be used to design an effective vaccine for the novel coronavirus that has killed more than 24,737 people in the U.S. and infected almost 2 million worldwide.
content:
